all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And upon this rock I will build my church; yea, upon this rock ye are built, and if ye continue, the gates of hell shall not prevail against you.
Doctrine and Covenants 33:13
Quote of the Day
"There is an inner space where we are free to choose whether or not we will decide to follow the pattern the Lord has prepared."
Ulisses Soares | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
